verses.verse: Now Jericho<WH3405> was directly<WH5462> shut up<WH5462> because<WH6440> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: none went out<WH3318>, and none came in<WH935>.

And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, See<WH7200>, I have given<WH5414> into your hand<WH3027> Jericho<WH3405>, and the king<WH4428> there<WH1368>, and the mighty men of valor<WH2428>.
And you shall compass<WH5437> the city<WH5892>, all you men<WH582> of war<WH4421>, and go round about<WH5362> the city<WH5892> once<WH6471>. Thus shall you do<WH6213> six<WH8337> days<WH3117>.

And seven<WH7651> priests<WH3548> shall carry<WH5375> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> seven<WH7651> trumpets<WH7782> of rams<WH3104>' horns: and the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> you shall compass<WH5437> the city<WH5892> seven<WH7651> times<WH6471>, and the priests<WH3548> shall blow<WH8628> with the trumpets<WH7782>.

And it shall come to pass<WH4900>, that when they make a long blast with the ram<WH3104>'s horn<WH7161>, and when you hear<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet<WH7782>, all the people<WH5971> shall shout<WH7321> with a great<WH1419> shout<WH8643>; and the wall<WH2346> of the city<WH5892> shall fall down<WH5307> flat<WH8478>, and the people<WH5971> shall ascend up<WH5927> every man straight before him<WH376>.

And Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> called<WH7121> the priests<WH3548>, and said<WH559> unto them<WH5375>, Take up the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285>, and let seven<WH7651> priests<WH3548> carry<WH5375> seven<WH7651> trumpets<WH7782> of rams<WH3104>' horns before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the Lord<WH3068>.
And he said<WH559> unto the people<WH5971>, Pass on<WH5674>, and compass<WH5437> the city<WH5892>, and let him that is armed<WH2502> pass on<WH5674> before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the Lord<WH3068>.

And it came to pass<WH3091>, when Joshua had spoken<WH559> unto the people<WH5971>, that the seven<WH7651> priests<WH3548> bearing<WH5375> the seven<WH7651> trumpets<WH7782> of rams<WH3104>' horns passed on<WH5674> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, and blew<WH8628> with the trumpets<WH7782>: and the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the Lord<WH3068> followed<WH1980> them<WH310>.

And the armed<WH2502> men went<WH1980> before<WH6440> the priests<WH3548> that blew<WH8628> with the trumpets<WH7782>, and the rereward<WH622> came<WH1980> after<WH310> the ark<WH727>, the priests going on<WH1980>, and blowing<WH8628> with the trumpets<WH7782>.

And Joshua<WH3091> had commanded<WH6680> the people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, You shall not shout<WH7321>, nor make any noise<WH8085> with your voice<WH6963>, neither shall any word<WH1697> proceed<WH3318> out of your mouth<WH6310>, until the day<WH3117> I bid<WH559> you shout<WH7321>; then shall you shout<WH7321>.
So the ark<WH727> of the Lord<WH3068> compassed<WH5437> the city<WH5892>, going about<WH5362> it once<WH6471>: and they came<WH935> into the camp<WH4264>, and lodged<WH3885> in the camp<WH4264>.
And Joshua<WH3091> rose early<WH7925> in the morning<WH1242>, and the priests<WH3548> took up<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the Lord<WH3068>.

And seven<WH7651> priests<WH3548> bearing<WH5375> seven<WH7651> trumpets<WH7782> of rams<WH3104>' horns before<WH6440> the ark<WH727> of the Lord<WH3068> went on<WH1980> continually<WH1980>, and blew<WH8628> with the trumpets<WH7782>: and the armed men<WH2502> went<WH1980> before<WH6440> them<WH622>; but the rereward came<WH1980> after<WH310> the ark<WH727> of the Lord<WH3068>, the priests going on<WH1980>, and blowing<WH8628> with the trumpets<WH7782>.
And the second<WH8145> day<WH3117> they compassed<WH5437> the city<WH5892> once<WH6471>, and returned<WH7725> into the camp<WH4264>: so they did<WH6213> six<WH8337> days<WH3117>.

And it came to pass on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117>, that they rose early<WH7925> about the dawning<WH5927> of the day<WH7837>, and compassed<WH5437> the city<WH5892> after the same manner<WH4941> seven<WH7651> times<WH6471>: only on that day<WH3117> they compassed<WH5437> the city<WH5892> seven<WH7651> times<WH6471>.

And it came to pass at the seventh<WH7637> time<WH6471>, when the priests<WH3548> blew<WH8628> with the trumpets<WH7782>, Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> unto the people<WH5971>, Shout<WH7321>; for the Lord<WH3068> has given<WH5414> you the city<WH5892>.

And the city<WH5892> shall be accursed<WH2764>, even it<WH3068>, and all that are in it, to the Lord: only Rahab<WH7343> the prostitute<WH2181> shall live<WH2421>, she and all that are with her in the house<WH1004>, because she hid<WH2244> the messengers<WH4397> that we sent<WH7971>.

And you<WH7535>, in any wise keep<WH8104> yourselves from the accursed thing<WH2764>, lest you make yourselves accursed<WH2763>, when you take<WH3947> of the accursed thing<WH2764>, and make<WH7760> the camp<WH4264> of Israel<WH3478> a curse<WH2764>, and trouble it<WH5916>.

But all the silver<WH3701>, and gold<WH2091>, and vessels<WH3627> of brass<WH5178> and iron<WH1270>, are consecrated<WH6944> unto the Lord<WH3068>: they shall come<WH935> into the treasury<WH214> of the Lord<WH3068>.

So the people<WH5971> shouted<WH7321> when the priests blew<WH8628> with the trumpets<WH7782>: and it came to pass<WH5971>, when the people heard<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet<WH7782>, and the people<WH5971> shouted<WH7321> with a great<WH1419> shout<WH8643>, that the wall<WH2346> fell down flat<WH5307>, so that the people<WH5971> went up<WH5927> into the city<WH5892>, every man<WH376> straight before him<WH3920>, and they took the city<WH5892>.

And they utterly destroyed<WH2763> all that was in the city<WH5892>, both man<WH376> and woman<WH802>, young<WH5288> and old<WH2205>, and ox<WH7794>, and sheep<WH7716>, and donkey<WH2543>, with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>.

But Joshua<WH3091> had said<WH559> unto the two<WH8147> men<WH582> that had spied out<WH7270> the country<WH776>, Go<WH935> into the prostitute<WH2181>'s house<WH1004>, and bring out<WH3318> there the woman<WH802>, and all that she has<WH7650>, as you swore unto her.

And the young men<WH5288> that were spies<WH7270> went in<WH935>, and brought out<WH3318> Rahab<WH7343>, and her father<WH1>, and her mother<WH517>, and her brothers<WH251>, and all that she had<WH3318>; and they brought out all her relatives<WH4940>, and left<WH3240> them without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264> of Israel<WH3478>.

And they burnt<WH8313> the city<WH5892> with fire<WH784>, and all that was in it<WH3701>: only the silver, and the gold<WH2091>, and the vessels<WH3627> of brass<WH5178> and of iron<WH1270>, they put<WH5414> into the treasury<WH214> of the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>.

And Joshua<WH3091> saved<WH2421> Rahab<WH7343> the prostitute<WH2181> alive<WH2421>, and her father<WH1>'s household<WH1004>, and all that she had<WH3427>; and she dwells in<WH7130> Israel<WH3478> even unto this day<WH3117>; because she hid<WH2244> the messengers<WH4397>, which Joshua<WH3091> sent<WH7971> to spy out<WH7270> Jericho<WH3405>.

And Joshua<WH3091> adjured<WH7650> them at that time<WH6256>, saying<WH559>, Cursed<WH779> be the man<WH376> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, that rises up<WH6965> and builds<WH1129> this city<WH5892> Jericho<WH3405>: he shall lay the foundation<WH3245> there in his firstborn<WH1060>, and in his youngest<WH6810> son shall he set up<WH5324> the gates of it<WH1817>.
So the Lord<WH3068> was with Joshua<WH3091>; and his fame<WH8089> was noised throughout all the country<WH776>.
